item.title: Aspose.Tasks for Python via .NET 22.12 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.Tasks for Python via .NET 22.12. All Changes Key Summary Issue Type TASKSNET-10724 Fix escaping of text values when writing project to XER format. Enhancement TASKSNET-10717 Add LinkLagTimeSpan property to TaskLink. Enhancement TASKSNET-3704 Fix cost calculations for case when multiple rates are effective on a day. Enhancement TASKSNET-10723 Fix System.
